name: RegentCon Adventure
description:
Join Professors Tillett and Hollis on a journey to RegentCon, but remember to bring your nerd knowledge with you in order to get in past the gatekeepers.

Join us at RegentCon 2019 on March 30th, 2019 from 11-7PM.

More info here: RegentCon Info

Pre-Register here: RegentCon Pre-Registration

See More from the Artists and visit them at RegentCon:

Andrew Hollis - Producer/Designer

Jesse Wahl - Programmer

Winters Angeles - Frostbun - Key Art

Devan Faye Spady - Avengers Cosplay Art

Jackson Dove-Green - My Hero Academia Cosplay Art

Krysten Ferrer - Kingdom Hearts Cosplay Art

Kiera Gregg - Super Secret Doctor Who Art
